meanings.definition: Soft and yielding to the touch.
meanings.sent1: The pillow was squooshy and comfortable to rest on.
meanings.sent2: The marshmallow was so squooshy, it melted in my mouth.
meanings.sent3: I love how squooshy my favorite blanket feels when I wrap myself in it.
meanings.sent4: Her heart felt squooshy with affection for the little puppy.
meanings.sent5: The mud was squooshy under my feet after the rain.

meanings.definition: Making a soft, muffled sound when pressed.
meanings.sent1: The squooshy toy made a quiet noise when squeezed.
meanings.sent2: The squooshy sponge absorbed the water with a gentle squish.
meanings.sent3: The squooshy ball whispered as it bounced off the wall.
meanings.sent4: The squooshy fruit made a hushed sound when I bit into it.
meanings.sent5: The squooshy snow made a soft crunching sound under my boots.

meanings.definition: A feeling of being comfortably relaxed or cozy.
meanings.sent1: After a long day, sinking into the squooshy armchair felt like heaven.
meanings.sent2: The squooshy bed enveloped me in warmth and comfort.
meanings.sent3: The squooshy blanket was like a hug from a cloud.
meanings.sent4: The squooshy couch beckoned for a lazy afternoon nap.
meanings.sent5: The squooshy sweater was perfect for a chilly evening by the fire.
